mapper.select: SELECT a.feed_id AS feedId, a.contents, a.location, a.created_at AS createdAt , b.user_id AS writerId , if(b.nick_name IS NULL, b.uid, b.nick_name) as writerNm , b.pic as writerPic FROM feed a JOIN user b ON a.writer_user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY a.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
